title: Commission Regulation (EC) No 1473/97 of 28 July 1997 adjusting the agrimonetary compensatory aid granted in Denmark
header:
COMMISSION REGULATION (EC) No 1473/97 of 28 July 1997 adjusting the agrimonetary compensatory aid granted in Denmark
THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES
main_body: The third tranche of compensatory payments provided for in Regulation (EC) No 1527/95 for Denmark is hereby cancelled.

This Regulation shall enter into force on the day following its publication in the Official Journal of the European Communities.
This Regulation shall be binding in its entirety and directly applicable in all Member States.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 28 July 1997.
For the Commission
Franz FISCHLER
Member of the Commission
